title: Oded Ezer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Oded Ezer**

'Oded Ezer' is an [Israeli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Israel) typographer and type designer, who specializes in typography for branding and publications. His work includes experimental projects that push the boundaries of typography towards the realm of installation art.

URL: [http://www.odedezer.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/www.odedezer.com/ "http://www.odedezer.com/")

**Additional Articles:**  
 [Oded Ezer - experimental Hebrew typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/www.pingmag.jp/2006/01/20/oded-ezer-experimental-hebrew-typography/) from [PingMag](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/typophile.com/wiki/PingMag)  
 [T(ypography)-shirt!](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415052219/http:/www.t-1.cc/2nd/e/artist/oded_ezer/index.html)
author: hrant
